snippet: A former guard was found guilty of taking bribes from a Hawaii prison gang to smuggle drugs and cigarettes to prisoners, while an inmate was convicted of leading a brutal attack to maintain his position in the gang....

headline.print_headline: Ex-Guard, Inmate Convicted in Hawaii Gang Trial
headline.main: Ex-Guard, Inmate Convicted in Hawaii Gang Trial

lead_paragraph: A former guard was found guilty of taking bribes from a Hawaii prison gang to smuggle drugs and cigarettes to prisoners, while an inmate was convicted of leading a brutal attack to maintain his position in the gang.
